title: haven't played the game for a while n apparently I'm permanently banned? for no reason at all????
body: this is some bs riot is doing man i haven't play a single game in like 4 months and they decided to ban me? if this is the case i request all the money i spend on this game.

replies.body: More than likely your account was compromised and used for cheating. But if you want to say "fk riot" then I guess you could not submit a ticket to get your account back. Whatever you prefer.
what do u mean by used for cheating? it was just a normal account no hacks nothing just see a reason why they would ban me, i have already sent a ticket and still haven't got a reply from riot yet

Cheating as in scripting, 3rd party hacks, anything non-Riot that gives an advantage in game. Like I said, ,if YOU didn't use the account for cheating then it is most likely compromised.

As for not receiving an email, check your junk/spam folder for it, but assuming it's not there, it's entirely possible your email is compromised as well, as that is often how intruders will get ahold of your account details and password. Change your account password, your email password, and submit an account recovery ticket.
